author: pbs.org
title: Democrats Spar in 1st Debate, Obama Slows Afghan Withdrawal | Watch Washington Week
text: The five Democratic White House hopefuls squared off in their Party's first debate of the 2016 Election with issues ranging from gun control, foreign policy and Hillary Clintonâ€™s State Department emails. President Obama announced this week his decision to delay the withdrawal of U.S. troops from Afghanistan which will push American occupation within the country well into 2016.
